item.title: The Man Behind Amazon's Robot Army Wants Everyone to Have an AI-Powered Helper
item.description: Brad Porter helped Amazon deploy an army of warehouse robots. His new creation—Proxie—could help other companies embrace more automation.

item.title: Comcast spins off its cable channels into separate company as it looks for growth
